string-array.name: sign_summaries
string-array.item: Aries belongs to the element of fire. They are pioneering, confident, dynamic and quick-witted. Some may be selfish, impulsive, impatient, and daredevil.
Taurus belongs to the element of earth. They are reliable, warmhearted, loving, persistent, determined, placid and security loving. Some may be resentful, selfish and greedy.
Gemini belongs to the element of air. They are adaptable, versatile, witty, eloquent, youthful and lively. Some may be tense, inconsistent and cunning.
Cancer belongs to the element of water. They are emotional, shrewd, cautious and protective. Some may be clinging and touchy.
Leo belongs to the element of fire. They are generous, creative, broad-minded, expansive and faithful. Some may be patronizing, bossy, interfering, dogmatic and intolerant.
Virgo belongs to the element of earth. They are modest, shy, meticulous, reliable, intelligent and analytical. Some may be fussy, overcritical, perfectionist and conservative.
Libra belongs to the element of air. They are diplomatic, urbane, romantic, charming, easygoing, idealistic and quick to compromise. Some may be indecisive, changeable, gullible and flirtatious.
Scorpio belongs to the element of water. They are determined, forceful, powerful, passionate, exciting and magnetic. Some may be resentful, compulsive, obsessive, secretive and obstinate.

Sagittarius belongs to the element of fire. They are optimistic, freedom-loving, jovial, honest, straightforward and philosophical. Some may be careless, irresponsible, superficial, tactless and restless.
Capricorn belongs to the element of earth. They are prudent, ambitious, disciplined, careful and reserved. Some may be pessimistic, miserly and grudging.
Aquarius belongs to the element of air. They are friendly, humanitarian, honest, loyal, original, inventive and independent. Some may be intractable, contrary, unpredictable and unemotional.
Pisces belongs to the element of water. They are compassionate, kind, selfless and spiritual. Some may be idealistic, secretive, vague, weak-willed, easily led and escapist.

string-array.name: element_summaries
string-array.item: Signs belonging to the element of fire are believed to be leaders, enthusiastic, rebellious and brave. May be hot-tempered.
Signs belonging to the element of earth are are believed to be calm, practical, hard-working, brave, stable and patient. May be stubborn, possessive, short-sighted and harsh.
Signs belonging to the element of air are believed to be kind, intellectual, communicative and social. May be selfish, superficial and insensitive to emotion.
Signs belonging to the element of water are believed to be emotional, deep, nurturing, sympathetic, imaginative and intuitive. May be cold, moody, jealous, sentimental, sensitive and irrational.
